Class ModOption<E>

java.lang.Object
  net.minecraft.src.modoptionsapi.ModOption<E>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ModBooleanOption, ModMappedMultiOption, ModMultiOption, ModSliderOption
public abstract class ModOption<E>
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract base class for individual option classes
